mapper.select: SELECT /* COGpcReceiveRestMapper.selectGpcEdctnList */ edctn_seq as kap_seq , gpc_edctn_type as edu_type , gpc_parnt_ctgry as ctgry , gpc_ctgry as trck , nm as prcs_nm , gpc_lvl as lvl , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=a.stduy_dd_cd) as edu_dd_cnt , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=a.stduy_time_cd) as edu_time , gpc_fxnum_cnt , gpc_rfn_prcs as rfnd_prcs , gpc_isttr_id as adm_seq , pc_stduy_cntn as edu_cntn , itrdc_cntn as edu_dtl , kap_send_dd , date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') as kap_send_dd from ed_edctn_prcs_mst a WHERE exps_yn = 'Y' AND DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d') <= mod_dtm

SELECT /* COGpcReceiveRestMapper.selectGpcEpisdList */ a.edctn_seq as kap_seq , a.episd_seq as kap_schd_seq , b.gpc_parnt_ctgry as ctgry , b.gpc_ctgry as trck , b.nm as prcs_nm , b.gpc_lvl as lvl , a.episd_year as edu_year , a.episd_ord as ord , date_format(a.edctn_strt_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') as edu_strt , date_format(a.edctn_end_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') as edu_end , date_format(a.accs_strt_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') as rqst_strt , date_format(a.accs_end_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') as rqst_end , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=b.stduy_time_cd) as edu_time , a.fxnum_cnt as max_cnt , (select count(mem_seq) from ep_edctn_ptcpt_mst where edctn_seq = a.edctn_seq and episd_year = a.episd_year and episd_ord = a.episd_ord and stts_cd = 'EDU_STTS_CD01') as rqst_cnt , b.gpc_rfn_prcs as rfnd_prcs , b.gpc_isttr_id as adm_seq , date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') as kap_send_dd , case edctn_stts_cd when 'EDCTN_STTS_CD01' then CASE WHEN edctn_cmpltn_yn = 'Y' then 'Y' ELSE 'N' END WHEN 'EDCTN_STTS_CD02' then 'R' END exam_flag from ed_edctn_episd_mst a left join ed_edctn_prcs_mst b on b.edctn_seq = a.edctn_seq where a.exps_yn = 'Y' and a.edctn_seq = #{kapSeq}

SELECT /* COGpcReceiveRestMapper.selectGpcPtcptList */ C.EDCTN_SEQ AS kap_Seq , B.EPISD_SEQ AS kap_Schd_Seq , D.ID AS kapId , D.NAME , CASE D.gndr WHEN 1 THEN 'M' ELSE 'F' END AS gndr_Cd , E.cmpn_nm , C.gpc_parnt_ctgry AS ctgry , C.gpc_ctgry AS trck , C.NM AS prcsNm , C.gpc_lvl AS lvl , B.EPISD_ORD AS ORD , C.stduy_dd_cd AS EDU_DD_CNT , date_format(b.edctn_strt_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') as edu_strt , date_format(b.edctn_end_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') as edu_end , C.gpc_rfn_prcs AS rfnd_Prcs , date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') as kap_send_dd
FROM ep_edctn_ptcpt_mst A LEFT JOIN ed_edctn_episd_mst B ON B.EPISD_SEQ = A.EPISD_SEQ LEFT JOIN ed_edctn_prcs_mst C ON C.EDCTN_SEQ = B.EDCTN_SEQ LEFT JOIN co_mem_mst D ON D.mem_seq = A.mem_seq LEFT JOIN cp_cmpn_mst E ON E.bsnm_no = A.ptcpt_bsnm_no
WHERE 1=1 AND A.EPISD_SEQ = #{kapSchdSeq} AND a.STTS_CD = 'EDU_STTS_CD01'

SELECT /* COGpcReceiveRestMapper.selectGpcPtcptExamList */ c.edctn_seq as kap_seq , b.episd_seq as kap_schd_seq , d.id as kap_id , a.exam_score as tot_score , a.cmptn_yn , date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') as kap_send_dd FROM ep_edctn_ptcpt_mst A LEFT JOIN ed_edctn_episd_mst B ON B.EPISD_SEQ = A.EPISD_SEQ LEFT JOIN ed_edctn_prcs_mst C ON C.EDCTN_SEQ = B.EDCTN_SEQ LEFT JOIN co_mem_mst D ON D.mem_seq = A.mem_seq WHERE 1=1 AND A.EPISD_SEQ = #{kapSchdSeq} AND a.STTS_CD = 'EDU_STTS_CD01'
